instruction_3: 3. Press key on keyboard according to folder number to move file
instruction_4: 4. You can always change or create any destination or source folder
instruction_5: 5. Press SPACE to skip current file
instruction_6: 6. Press BACKSPACE to undo last action
instruction_7: 7. To exit press ‘X’ icon in the upper right corner or Esc button
instruction_8: 8. Keep an eye on the console for messages (bottom left)
